scripts.pkg: npm run bundle && pkg build/index.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output build/collab-server.exe
scripts.stage:public: rimraf public && mkdir public && xcopy /E /I ..\client\dist public\  >NUL
scripts.build:app: npm run build:client && npm run stage:public && npm run bundle
scripts.installer:nsis: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$err=$null; $makensis=(Get-Command makensis -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).Source; if (-not $makensis) { $makensis='C:\Program Files (x86)\NSIS\Bin\makensis.exe' }; if (-Not (Test-Path $makensis)) { Write-Error 'makensis not found; install NSIS or adjust path'; exit 1 }; & $makensis installer.nsi"
